member.name: M:iRINGTools.SDK.SPPIDDataLayer.Common.SQLUnique.IsQuotable(System.String)
member.summary: determines if a value of a particular type should be quoted or not
member.remarks: This function is not very robust - should check to verify that the string represents something that can actually come from information_schema.columns. If not, an error should be thrown

member.name: T:iRINGTools.SDK.SPPIDDataLayer.Common.SQLUnique
member.summary: Represents a uniquely defined table or column name
member.remarks: Also provided functionality for determining whether a column value should be quoted or not

member.summary: Assemble the query according to the order of the sql clauses defined by the SQLClause Enumeration Empty clauses and clauses consisting of only the clause start word are skipped

member.summary: removes ALL leading and trailing space characters including tab and new line chars

member.name: M:iRINGTools.SDK.SPPIDDataLayer.Common.UnpaddedCount(System.String)
member.summary: returns the number of ascii characters a-zA-Z-_0-9 and any non-leading spaces excludes any leading tabs, spaces, and new line characters
